name: The "Arguments" Section of a Dictionary Entry
prev: The "Affected By" Section of a Dictionary Entry
next: The "Arguments and Values" Section of a Dictionary Entry

sections.type: The "Arguments" Section of a Dictionary Entry
sections.text:
This information describes the syntax information of entries such as those
for declarations and special expressions which are never evaluated as
forms, and so do not return values.

This information describes the syntax information of entries such as those
for declarations and special expressions which are never evaluated as
forms, and so do not return values.
